original: @127b bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo /
analyzed: @127b bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo /
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, the Jewel Banner.

original: na mo bha ga wa te ratna ke tu ra dz'a ya /
analyzed: na mo bha ga wa te ratna ke tu ra dz'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / aom ratne ratne mah'a ratne ratna b'i dza ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom ratne ratne mah'a ratne ratna b'i dza ye sv'ah'a /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ ratne ratne mahā-ratne ratna-vīje svāhā.

original: 'di brjod cing bskor ba gcig byas pa'ang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di brjod cing bskor ba gcig byas pa'ang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting this and circumambulating once, even an immeasurable [number of circumambulations] will be performed.
The Dhāraṇī of Circumambulation is complete.
